TransactionEvents.description: Contains all events emitted during transaction execution.

diagnosticEventsXdr.description: Base64-encoded diagnostic events (`xdr.DiagnosticEvent`) that include system events generated during contract execution.

transactionEventsXdr.description: Base64-encoded transaction events (`xdr.TransactionEvent`) such as fees charged or refunded.

contractEventsXdr.description: Array of arrays of base64-encoded contract events (`xdr.ContractEvent`). Each inner array contains the events emitted by a single operation within the transaction.

ContractEvent.description: Base64-encoded contract events emitted by a single operation within the transaction.
